T02TD1587E:103b-1: badzra yo gi n'i sto tra /
T02TD1587E:103b-3: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la bstod pa //
T02TD1587E:103b-4: rdo rje mkha' spyod ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1587E:103b-5: hr'i: las gyur pa'i mkha' spyod ni //
T02TD1587E:103b-6: nyon mongs gdung ba bsil ba'i phyir ;
T02TD1587E:103b-7: / mkha' la dri med pad zla'i steng //
T02TD1587E:103b-8: lang tsho shin tu mdzes pa la //
T02TD1587E:103b-9: bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i tshul //
T02TD1587E:103b-10: 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-12: 'gro rnams gnyid las sad mdzad phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-13: grag stong h'um dang phat sgra sgrogs //
T02TD1587E:103b-14: bde dang stong pa lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1587E:103b-15: gnyis su med pa'i zung 'jug thugs //
T02TD1587E:103b-16: mkha' la spyod phyir zhabs gnyis ni //
T02TD1587E:103b-17: rgyab nas phrag pa gnyis la bkal //
T02TD1587E:103b-19: bha ga rgyas shing shin tu yangs //
T02TD1587E:103b-20: thabs shes gnyis su med pa'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-21: sku smad rus pa'i rgyan dang bcas //
T02TD1587E:103b-22: chags shing bde brgyas pa'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-23: sku sha rgyas shing nu ma 'bur //
T02TD1587E:103b-24: ma rig rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-25: phyag g-yas gri gug mkha' la 'phyar //
T02TD1587E:103b-26: gnyis med bdud rtsi mdzes pa'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-27: phyag g-yon thod pa mkha' la 'dzin //
T02TD1587E:103b-28: 'gro ba'i don la dgyes mdzad phyir ;
T02TD1587E:103b-29: / zhal ni 'dzum khro dag dang ldan //
T02TD1587E:103b-30: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gzigs pa'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-31: spyan gsum mkha' la drag tu gzigs //
T02TD1587E:103b-32: sku lnga yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-33: dbu la thod skam lnga yis brgyan //
T02TD1587E:103b-34: chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-35: dbu skra mthon mthing shin tu gnag / nyon mongs bag chags bsnyil ba'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-36: rus bcas lcang los se stod non //
T02TD1587E:103b-37: sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-38: 'gying tshul dar gyi cod pan mdzes //
T02TD1587E:103b-39: yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-40: dbu rgyan snyan cha dpung rgyan dang //
T02TD1587E:103b-41: mgul rgyan do shal do shal phyed //
T02TD1587E:103b-42: phyag gdub zhabs gdub rgyan rnams ni //
T02TD1587E:103b-43: rin po che yis rab tu spras //
T02TD1587E:103b-44: rnam rtog spangs phyir mi mgo'i phreng //
T02TD1587E:103b-45: brgya phyed dag gis ga shal byas //
T02TD1587E:103b-46: nyon mongs bud shing bsreg pa'i phyir //
T02TD1587E:103b-47: me ri dkar po'i gseb na bzhugs //
T02TD1587E:104a-3: mkha' spyod ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1587E:104a-4: dad brtson dam tshig ldan pa yis //
T02TD1587E:104a-5: mchod bstod gsol ba btab gyur na //
T02TD1587E:104a-6: yang dag mkha' spyod gnas su ni //
T02TD1587E:104a-8: mdun gyi mkha' la lha mo khyod bzhugs nas //
T02TD1587E:104a-9: lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlabs pa dang //
T02TD1587E:104a-10: bems rig bral tshe bar chod med pa ru //
T02TD1587E:104a-11: yang dag mkha' spyod thugs su drang du gsol //
T02TD1587E:104a-12: mkha' spyod ma dkar mo'i bstod pa /
T02TD1587E:104a-13: pandi ta d'i pam ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1587E:104a-16: lo ts'a ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
